title: Troubled Roma still prove a great challenge for Inter, says Inzaghi
description: Simone Inzaghi still expects Inter to put their best foot forward as he anticipates a tough test against struggling Roma on Sunday. Roma have won just two of their nine games across all competitions this season, though Ivan Juric’s side are unbeaten in their last three home outings. Inter, meanwhile, slipped down to third following […] The post Troubled Roma still prove a great challenge for Inter, says Inzaghi appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Juve ´complete´ without suspended Pogba, says club director Giuntoli
description: Paul Pogba’s hopes of playing for Juventus again took a hit on Saturday when Bianconeri director Cristiano Giuntoli said that the Serie A side are complete without him. The 31-year-old midfielder will end his doping ban in March after testing positive for DHEA in September 2023, a banned substance that boosts testosterone levels. The former […] The post Juve ´complete´ without suspended Pogba, says club director Giuntoli appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
